pr_title: parseColor("") throws IndexOutOfBounds, so catch all Exceptions is better

timeline.message:
parseColor("") throws IndexOutOfBounds, so catch all Exceptions is better

Signed-off-by: tobiasKaminsky <tobias@kaminsky.me>

timeline.bodyText: @tobiasKaminsky Exception or Throwable since this won't help with runtime exceptions.
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText:
According to code there is no Runtime Exception possible:
String.charAt() -> IndexOutOfBoundsException
Long.parseLong() -> NumberFormatException
parseColor -> IllegalArgumentException
So it should be enough.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky
